name: Steve Lipofsky
text: I got an Italian sub and it was fine. The bread was fresh and there was a reasonable amount of good Italian cold cuts. …More

name: Hope Hunt
text: Fast and friendly service. Small menu which made decision-making faster. Nice dining room setup with a handful of booths.

name: Sarah Wesley
text: Melissa J. was my server today....very pleasnat and extremely courtious. I had her decide on how to make my cheese steak and it was fantastic! She served my sandwich with pride while explaining her choices for me. Melissa adds the old fashioned "Mom and Pop' personality to a frequently impersonal area of business. Thanks Melissa!

name: Ed Norton
text: Service is prompt and friendly. Place is very clean and orderly.  As usual the food is good. Just tried the chicken teriyaki rice bowl - WOW! Going to have that again!

name: Dale Robertson
text: Tasty sandwiches BUT... D'Angelo's is definitely not what it was prior to being bought out by Papa Ginos. The sandwiches are decidedly smaller, and pricier and the overall value of the food has been diminished in favor of the "eat in, restaurant booth, table delivery" 3/13/19 UPDATE this location is now closed...

name: David Fox
text: What can you say?  Always consistent and always good.  My go to sandwich place when I am near one.

name: Geek Doll
text: Ordered an hot Italian to-go but found out when I got home it was a crappy steak and cheese even though the tag clearly had my name and the correct sandwich name. I was so hungry I didnt want to go back but I should have because the sandwich was soggy and gave me heartburn. Now I will never go back.

name: Pandafeifei
text: My boyfriend loves the lobster rolls and has been getting them for a long time when he used to live in area. I only went as he made it seem like the most amazing place ever. I guess my expectations were a little high... I have had better. …More

name: Serenity's World
text: Fresh and hot.  Good service and nice hot food.  Just the way you want it.

name: Karen H
text: Great subs & salads. We always stop when we're visiting New England. Our local one closed.

name: R R
text: Great food.  Busy at lunch time, people waiting.  Cashier was busy on her phone in between orders.

name: Brian That Chef Guy
text: Terrible Customer service. Rude  nasty shift leader. Messed up my order 3 times same sandwich. Touched seafood the my food. I have a seafood allergy. They said not my problem

name: Ginni Simpson
text: Absolutely love there #9 steak sandwich with onions , mushrooms and peppers with cheese always cooked perfect and bread is very soft which i love !

name: Walter Smith
text: These are the best steak and cheese subs on the planet.

name: Carol Lacourse
text: Love their Steak #9.  Unique taste, fresh roll.

name: Erika Q Stokes
text: I eat take out from this restaurant at least once a month because of its proximity to my workplace. Every time I order something, it's wrong in some way. Usually a different way each time, and usually it's still edible, even if it wasn't …More

name: Chickadee
text: I've gone to this location for many years. Staff is always friendly and willing to go above and beyond to provide great service and food for both patrons and new customers

name: Donna Bevis
text: I had the thanksgiving toasted sub... Ohh my favorite. Staff was friendly and attentive.

name: CJ Butler
text: You get what you expect. Lower carb items and gluten free too. Friendly at this location!

name: Kathryn Hughes
text: We enjoyed our experience and will be back. Delicious food

name: Rolaundo Wright
text: Good service and the food was good.

name: Nichole Adams
text: Lobster bisque soup is great. Just wish more pieces of lobster in it. The #9 is amazing

name: hungrr1
text: Quick, efficient, food. Better than subway but still mediocre fast food

name: Paul Crossman
text: It's a D'Angelos.  Service was good.  They brought the order to the table.  Staff was helpful and friendly.

name: Matt Daoust
text: Good service, acceptable wait, great food.

name: Debora Cunha
text: Great sandwiches, but they razed the price a lot

name: Ryan Glossop
text: Pretty good food, nothing too special, but good for a quick bite to eat.

name: Glenn Clark
text: Good food fairly priced

name: Jonathan Layman
text: Best cheeseteak! Always love dangelo

name: robert chalifour
text: Food was fine. 1/2 he wait for one sandwich not so fine.

name: Tinker Toy II
text: Great location. Order online and it's ready when you get there.

name: Todd Pultorak
text: Love me some lobster bisque.

name: Dennis Stevens
text: Decent sandwich for  the price.

name: Norman Lavoie
text: good selection of food but normally busy.

name: John Labonte
text: Friendly. Food good

name: glenda ethier

name: Greg Ferraro

name: Donna
text: Food not that great had to go back 2 order wrong then it tasted like onions

text: Very bad..  I ordered online and half of the items weren't on my sandwich.

text: I like my sandwich but place was Very dirty, Alexis is very rude.

name: Bill Hammond
text: Number 9!! It's the one your cardiologist has for lunch.
